############## Section 1: Setup ############## 

## clear environment and turn scientific notation off
```{r setup_1}
rm(list = ls())
options(scipen = 999)
```

## Load packages
```{r setup_2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman"); 
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, dplyr, ggplot2, robumeta, metafor, MAc, clubSandwich, multcomp)
```
